Meet The Team

Our team of qualified accountants and financial consultants can help your business at any stage of it’s growth.

Professor

Buru Chang

Assistant Professor
Department of Artificial Intelligence, Sogang University
Department of Computer Science & Engineering, Sogang University
Email: buru@sogang.ac.kr
[Google Scholar] [Personal Website] [CV]

Dr. Buru Chang is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Sogang University. Before joining Sogang University in Fall 2023, he spent three years as a machine learning research scientist at Hyperconnect (of Match Group). He received a Ph.D. degree from the Korea University (Advisor: Prof. Jaewoo Kang) in 2020, and also did B.S. from the Korea University in 2016.
